prompts: Create a small, fire-type Pokemon with a fluffy mane and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a quadruped Pokemon that resembles a dog and is primarily orange with black stripes.
Design a Pokemon with a cute and loyal personality, perfect for companionship in urban settings.
Generate an adorable creature that loves to roam in grasslands and forests, showcasing its fiery nature.
Make a Pokemon that has a combination of orange and white colors, reflecting warmth and energy.
Show me a lovely fire-type Pokemon that has a distinctive furry tail and a friendly expression.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure, with features that highlight its playful side.
